Text:
Wow, once again a real highlight ... and an interesting Spanish guitar lessen, too. Do you have some nice songs from 'Vaya con dios'? Love them too. 1000 thanks from your friend 
Tom 'Primeur' Beaujoulais (TPB) (just a nice charade)

..coming back to the expression 'charade':
'Big man - pig man' comes out of Pink Floyd's disc 'Animals'. Are there vids available? Same with early Genesis up to 'The lamb lies down on Broadway'? I deeply love this music. Tom

Hi Tom
Arguably the best Genesis studio album 
I like their music too 
I Will Try to find  video 'The lamb lies down on Broadway' just for you
Dear Zlatko, you're so patient and a real good friend. Would be nice to drink a pine of good Bavarian beer with you or some glasses of red wine, but must not be a Beaujoulais! cu again soon!

Hi Tom
Bavarian Bier
That sounds like a good idea! 
(Das klingt gut)
Let's see next upload
